entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
